diseases.name: Rust
symptoms: Orange or brown pustules on leaves

diseases.name: Leaf Blight
symptoms: Brown spots with yellow halos on leaves

diseases.name: Karnal Bunt
symptoms: Black powdery spore masses inside grains

growthStages.activity: Inspect for pests and apply treatment if needed
Harvest the crop and store properly

farming_tips: Use high-yield and disease-resistant varieties.
Monitor soil moisture regularly for optimal growth.
Apply fertilizers based on soil test results.
Practice crop rotation to improve soil fertility.
Implement integrated pest management to reduce crop loss.

irrigation.seasonal_adjustments: Increase irrigation in dry seasons, reduce before harvesting

diseases.name: Blast
symptoms: Grayish lesions with brown borders on leaves
